content: = slip one stitch knit-wise to your right needle ssk = slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knit-wise one at a construction time to your right needle then return the now- the puppets are a fun quick knit they are knit in turned stitches back to the left needle knit them the round on dpns from the bottom up they have both together through the back loop decreasing 1 bobble boots and arms to save on fiddly sewing this is a left leaning decrease the girl s hair is attached by looping it around the st s = stitch es head hole with a tapestry needle any decorations yo = yarn over are done with embroidery permission pattern notes although these puppets were designed for how to make small or large bobble for both sized knitting4peace you have my permission to use bobbles knit into the front of the next stitch then them in any way you wish but i do ask that you the back then the front turning 1 stitch into 3 make a small donation of $5 dollars or more to turn knitting and p3 turn knitting and k3 knitting4peace in exchange thank you kindly you for small bobble - repeat these two row one more can donate here time helpful guidelines for large bobble repeat these two row three more times see page 7 then for both bobbles with right side facing pass postal address second stitch on the right needle over the first pass mail completed items to k4p 2600 leyden street the 3rd over the first denver co 80207 now you are back to your original stitch count 2 girl instructions using your boot color cast on 16 sts divide the sts over 2 or 3 dpns and join to work in the round round 1 k3 mb small k1 mb small k10 change to dress color round 2 knit round 3 purl round 4-9 knit 6 rounds redistribute the sts to 2 dpns needle 1 & 2 now both have 8 sts each round 10 ssk k4 k2tog repeat 12 sts round 11 knit round 12 mb large k4 mb large k6 round 13 k9 m1l k3 13 sts change to hair color round 14 k3 yo k10 14 sts round 15 ssk k1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 into next stitch k1 k2tog k7 18 sts round 16 ssk k7 k2tog k7 16 sts change to hat color round 17-18 knit round 19 ssk k5 k2tog k7 14 sts round 20 ssk k3 k2tog repeat 10 sts round 21 ssk k1 k2tog repeat 6 sts round 22 k1 k2tog repeat 4 sts round 23 s1 k1 psso repeat 2sts break yarn draw end through the remaining 2 sts secure and hide in hat finishing page 5 girl with hijab instructions using your boot color cast on 16 sts divide the sts over 2 or 3 dpns and join to work in the round round 1 k3 mb small k1 mb
